text.div:
• Include these codes as defined in https://fhir.dk.swisstph-mis.ch/matchbox/fhir/CodeSystem/emcare-custom-codes
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    EmCare.B17.DE31Child HIV Positive - VirologicalThe client is HIV Positive (Virological Test)
    EmCare.B17.DE32Child HIV Positive - SerologicalThe client is HIV Positive (Serological Test)
    EmCare.B17.DE33Child HIV Positive - Unknown Type of TestThe client is HIV Positive (Unknown Type of Test)
    EmCare.B17.DE34Child HIV NegativeThe client is HIV Negative
    EmCare.B17.DE35Child HIV Status - Unknown or Not TestedThe client's HIV Status is unknown or the client has not been tested
    EmCare.B17.DE36Child HIV Status - Decline to answerThe client has delined to answer regarding HIV Status

designation.value: The client is HIV Positive (Virological Test)
The client is HIV Positive (Serological Test)

concept.display: Child HIV Positive - Unknown Type of Test

designation.value: The client is HIV Positive (Unknown Type of Test)

concept.display: Child HIV Status - Unknown or Not Tested

designation.value: The client's HIV Status is unknown or the client has not been tested

designation.value: The client has delined to answer regarding HIV Status
